name: 32nd World Conference on Food and Beverage Technology invites you to London, United Kingdom
content: On June 05â€“06, 2023, the 32nd World Conference on Food and Beverage Technology invites you to London, United Kingdom. This two-day conference includes plenary lectures, parallel sessions, poster presentations, and our perennially popular Workshop activities, offering something for every sector of the food and beverage industry. There will be something for everyone in the food and beverage industry at this two-day event, which will feature plenary lectures, parallel sessions, poster sessions, and our ever-popular "Workshop" events.
